# conversationContext

**Instance Property**

A reference to a conversation, such as a mail or messaging thread.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional var conversationContext: UIConversationContext? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this conversation context before the keyboard appears; the keyboard uses this context to initialize its conversation context value. When updates occur in the conversation, call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInputDelegate/conversationContext(_:didChange:)] on the `inputDelegate` property for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextInput] objects, such as UITextView/inputDelegate`or`UITextField/inputDelegate``.
